titleStmt.title: To the Great Turk and his King at Argiers together with a postscript of George Pattison's taking the Turks and setting them on their own shoar.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
Lurting, Thomas. 1632-1713. Of George Pattisons taking the Turks about the 8 month, 1663.

notesStmt.note: "Postscript Of George Pattisons taking the Turks about the 8 month, 1663.": p. 15-20. Signed Thomas Lurting.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
